# VEHICLE::SET_SUBMARINE_CRUSH_DEPTHS

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicleIndex
* **BOOL** enableCrushDamage: Whether or not to allow any crush damage effects.
* **FLOAT** visibleDamageDepth: Below this depth the sub starts to look like it's being crushed but doesn't harm the player.
* **FLOAT** airLeakDepth: Time spent below this depth will lead to air bubbles coming from the sub and the player starting to drown.
* **FLOAT** crushDepth: At this depth the sub will be wrecked and the occupants killed instantly.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Needs to be called every frame or it will be reset to the current global defaults.
